name: Lapin and The Spirit Totems
description:
Charge up totems and summon spirit animals to traverse and save the forest!

Game done for GoGodotJam2 with prompt Energy Source.

Also available on Gotm.io.

Assets used:

Music by:

Eric Mathias (www.soundimage.org)

SFX by:

HALFTONE SFX Pack Lite by VOiD1 (https://www.void1gaming.com/)
